mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select t.movie_name, t.movie_main_image, t.movie_code from (select movie_code, count(*) cnt from tbl_movie_buy_list group by movie_code having count(*) > 1 order by cnt desc) a, tbl_movie t where a.movie_code = t.movie_code) b) where rnum between 1 and 3
select * from (select rownum rnum, t.* from(select * from tbl_movie order by movie_regist_date desc) t) where rnum between 1 and 8
